claim: Immunosuppression is associated with a lower risk of moderate to severe acute respiratory distress syndrome in covid-19 .
label: SUPPORTED
evidence: CONCLUSIONS : In our cohort of COVID-19 patients, immunosuppression was associated with a lower risk of moderate-severe ARDS.

claim: Immunosuppression is associated with a higher risk of moderate to severe acute respiratory distress syndrome in covid-19.
label: REFUTED
evidence: CONCLUSIONS : In our cohort of COVID-19 patients, immunosuppression was associated with a lower risk of moderate-severe ARDS.
